europeana:record.dc:title: Observations on the symbiosis between Colus gracilis (Da Costa, 1778) (Mollusca: Gastropoda) and Hormathia digitata (O.F. Müller, 1776) (Cnidaria: Actiniaria)
Zoologische Verhandelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Ates R.M.L.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Colus gracilis; Hormathia digitata; Gastropoda; Actiniaria; symbiosis; behaviour; shell mounting; aquarium observations.
europeana:record.dc:description: Aquarium observations of the behaviour of the actinian Hormathia digitata when mounting live specimens of the gastropod Colus gracilis are fully described for the first time. C. gracilis actively initiates an association with H. digitata by approaching and remaining stationary near the actinian.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Observations on the symbiosis between Colus gracilis (Da Costa, 1778) (Mollusca: Gastropoda) and Hormathia digitata (O.F. Müller, 1776) (Cnidaria: Actiniaria) (URN:ISSN:0024-1652) (Volume 323) (Issue 21)
